Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered 2d agoHi there! I believe each CIS scheme is tied to the companies that offer them... eg your parent's or siblings companies.Alternatively you can also compare with the other sim only plans in the market, you may get a pretty good bang for your buck (in terms of data and talktime) as well!Here: https://seedly.sg/compare/sim-only-mobile-plans0 comments0
